channel.title: Moses Rifkin on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Moses Rifkin on The Huddle

item.title: It Takes Practice
item.description: Like any team, Death or Glory had its own mythology. As a green twenty-year old, very few tales of the past loomed as large for me as Paul Greffâ€™s block against the Condors in 1998. It seemed told and told again: as the deep in the zone at a critical point, Paul hears someone on the sideline telling him to drop and he does, without looking, just in time to get a game saving block.
